description: This is a commentary on the first book of the Qānūn, generally known as al-Kulliyāt (the Generalities). The commentary is titled Sharḥ al-Kulliyāt al-Qanūn (A Commentary on the Generalities of the Qānūn) and was composed by Damascene physician Ibn al-Nafīs, who died in 687 AH/1288 CE.
title: Sharḥ al-Kulliyāt al-Qanūn (A Commentary on the Generalities of the Qānūn)
author: Ibn al-Nafīs (d. 1288)
